snippet: The German Grand Prix was cut from the 2015 Formula One calendar after neither of the country’s two circuits was able to make a deal with Bernie Ecclestone, the series promoter.
abstract: Formula One drops German Grand Prix from its 2015 calendar; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: The German Grand Prix was cut from the 2015 Formula One calendar after neither of the country’s two circuits was able to make a deal with Bernie Ecclestone, the series promoter.
